name: Magcat and Fly Through Cubeland
description:
"You wake up as Magcat in Cubeland, not really looking for answers, just for a way out. Fortunately, there's someone there to help you! 

Unfortunately, they can't let you out that easily.

At least you won’t be lonely!"

This game was made for lame jam 26. The theme this time was "control the environment" and I kinda followed it, but "backwards", so I don't know if it counts but eh, I did it! I survived the jam! Hooray!

CREDITS:

* Bitsy Game Maker 8.4 by ledoux

* Borksy Game Hacker by AYolland. Hacks used:

   -Bitsymuse by David Mowatt

   -Character portraits by Sean S. LeBlanc

   -Edit room from dialog by Dana Holdampf

   -Push sprites  by jan0sc
